title: Quality management system for providers of high-risk AI systems

article_refs.quote: have a quality management system in place which complies with Article 17;
Providers of high-risk AI systems shall put a quality management system in place that ensures compliance with this Regulation.

legal_consequence.verbatim: Providers of high-risk AI systems shall put a quality management system in place that ensures compliance with this Regulation.

items.label: Penalty and enforcement (Article 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement. Member States enforce with effective, proportionate and dissuasive measures. Administrative fines for non-compliance with obligations (other than Article 5 prohibitions) may be up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% of worldwide turnover (whichever is higher), with SME caps; case-by-case factors and due process apply.

sources.quote: only Article 6(1), Articles 102 to 109 and Article 112 apply
